# [Interview #1163: Shadows of Self - San Francisco, Entry #2](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1163#2)

#### Question

What are the odds of making a Stormlight RPG?

#### Brandon Sanderson

If the Mistborn RPG goes well, maybe in the future.
